game.name: BACKROOM LOOP
game.shortDescription: Backroom Loop는 1인칭 심리 호러(엔터테인먼트) 게임입니다. 낯익은 듯한 공간에 갇혀 탐험하고 탈출해도… 다시 시작점으로 돌아갑니다. 이 루프에서 벗어날 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Backroom Loop is a first-person psychological horror (entertainment) game. You are trapped in a familiar-feeling space, exploring and escaping… only to return to the start. Can you break free from the loop?

reviewHighlights.text: BACKROOM LOOP is a compact yet unsettling psychological horror experience that leans into repetition, perception, and atmosphere rather than tradition...
